hackathon-description-text: Join enterprise developers, entrepreneurs, product designers, data scientists and expert mentors at TM Forum {open}:hack, Lisbon Portugal, February 6th & 7th 2017

hackathon-judges.judge-role: Chief IT Systems Architect, Distinguished Engineer, Vodafone
Director of Marketing Execution, Software product line, Huawei

hackathon-requirements: Please submit your team’s Entry to the location provided on DevPost by 4:00pm Feb 7th. Your submission should include:

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Each member of the winning team will receive a google home device

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion:
Use of TMF Open APIs & Huawei APIs
Minimum required to qualify is one Forum Open API and one Huawei API
Innovation & Creativity
Impact and value to industry or society
Completeness of solution

hackathon-description-header: Collaborating with Enterprise Developers, Architects & Innovators to creating Smart City / IoT solutions and collaborative assets to enable Open Digital Ecosystems
